item.opitems.knockback_stick.tooltip0: An extremely powerful and rare item, the Knockback Stick
item.opitems.knockback_stick.tooltip1: is second only to one item: The Better Knockback Stick.
item.opitems.knockback_stick.tooltip2: I know, very original name. You may now applaud.
item.opitems.better_knockback_stick.tool: The most OP item in all of the realm, the Better Knockback Stick
is so powerful, it can one shot almost anything!
(excluding boss mobs of course!) You wouldn't want to mess with
someone that has this legendary item.
item.opitems.fire_stick.tooltip0: A stick formed deep in the depths of the
item.opitems.fire_stick.tooltip1: Nether, this stick has adapted to the intense
item.opitems.raw_blaze_core.tooltip0: A core left over from a blaze, this item
item.opitems.raw_blaze_core.tooltip1: is so hot, that holding it sets you on fire.
item.opitems.refined_blaze_core.tooltip0: A refined version of the Raw Blaze Core. This
item.opitems.refined_blaze_core.tooltip1: only has one use: to craft the Fire Stick.
item.opitems.blaze_core_residue.tooltip0: Residue left over after the refining of a
item.opitems.blaze_core_residue.tooltip1: Raw Blaze Core into a Refined Blaze Core.
item.opitems.sponge_pistol.tooltip0: A sponge gun with a decent firing range.
item.opitems.sponge_ak.tooltip0: A sponge gun with a better firing range.
item.opitems.sponge_katana.tooltip0: A very powerful item that does a lot of damage.
